metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart deals with Viconia after she has been defeated. Shadowheart could have come here to lead a coup against Viconia and seize control of the Shar Grotto, or she could have turned from her faith and have come here to rescue her captive parents.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to the grotto with Shadowheart2. Talk to Viconia3. Win the fight4. Talk to her with Shadowheart nearby

5.speaker: Viconia DeVir
5.text: Finish it. Send me to Lady Shar's embrace.

4.speaker: Shadowheart
4.text: She still has answers I need.

25.speaker: Viconia DeVir
25.text: So blunt - have you forgotten all the interrogation techniques I taught you? Where is the finesse?

28.speaker: Viconia DeVir
28.text: They are right through that door, in the Chamber of Loss. Where they have been all along. You saw them many times, only we made you forget. But they didn't forget.

56.speaker: Viconia DeVir
56.text: They watched, as we moulded you. They watched. They wept. They bled - often at your hand. It may not be a happy reunion, but it will be a memorable one.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: She's just trying to rile you up.

43.speaker: Shadowheart
43.text: I know. But she's not lying. She made me in her image.

21.speaker: Player
21.text: This is a waste of time. Kill her.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: No, you should keep them talking as long as you can, then you kill them. She taught me that.

44.speaker: Shadowheart
44.text: Why? Why me? Why all this effort?

12.speaker: Viconia DeVir
12.text: Lady Shar commanded me. And I obeyed. I do not question - I merely act as she wills me to.
12.context: NodeContext: Resignation. 'Those were my orders. That's that'

45.speaker: Viconia DeVir
45.text: I had an enclave in Waterdeep, you know. Much grander than this. Shar ordered me to raze it, kill all who followed me - claim they betrayed me, when in fact I slew those who showed nothing but loyalty.
45.context: NodeContext: Bitterness creeping in. 'I had it all, and was forced to sacrifice it'

7.speaker: Viconia DeVir
7.text: Shar had me do that, and I did. To cover my tracks. To usher in you.

54.speaker: Viconia DeVir
54.text: You became my mission. To take a child of Selûne's, and turn her over to Lady Shar. To show that all light fades, and darkness will prevail in the end.

10.speaker: Viconia DeVir
10.text: All this was to make you into what the Dark Lady needed you to be - the planning. The training. Those deaths in Waterdeep. It was all to groom you to replace me at her right hand side. And still, you threw it away.

47.speaker: Player
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Shadowheart addresses Player, steps away from Viconia

14.speaker: Viconia DeVir
14.text: Sympathy is for the weak. I merely wanted to say my piece. I wanted her to know the cost of her education. Now do what you will.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: What do you want to do, Shadowheart?
58.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Shadowheart addresses Player, steps away from Viconia

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: I want to see my parents. And I don't care what happens to this one. She's been in my head long enough already. Do what you like. I know you'll choose well.
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Shadowheart addresses Player, steps away from Viconia

34.speaker: Viconia DeVir
34.text: What are you doing? Come back and finish this yourself! You owe me that!
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart glances back at Viconia

13.speaker: Shadowheart
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart glances back at Viconia

30.speaker: Player
30.text: She stands at the same crossroads you yourself once did, Viconia - but it seems you are not quite the teacher you thought.
30.context: NodeContext: Watching Shadowheart walk off and leave Viconia to our mercy, satisfied that Shar has not won

35.speaker: Player
35.text: She stands at the same crossroads you yourself once did, Viconia - but it seems you are not quite the teacher you thought.
35.context: NodeContext: Watching Shadowheart walk off and leave Viconia to our mercy, satisfied that Shar has not won

46.speaker: Jaheira
46.text: She stands at the same crossroads you yourself once did, Viconia - but it seems you are not quite the teacher you thought.
46.context: NodeContext: Watching Shadowheart walk off and leave Viconia to our mercy, satisfied that Shar has not won

48.speaker: Minsc
48.text: Boo thinks you have had every chance to change your ways. Count yourself blessed it is not he who judges you today.
48.context: NodeContext: Distaste, looking down on a defeated Viconia

23.speaker: Player
23.text: Go. If you're wise, you'll vanish.
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext: ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

16.speaker: Player
16.text: Go. If you're wise, you'll vanish.
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext: ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

20.speaker: Player
20.text: Go. If you're wise, you'll vanish.
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext: ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

41.speaker: Viconia DeVir
41.text: I am adept at it. Aluve.
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext: ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

50.speaker: Player
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player strikes. Viconia speaks to her goddess with her last breath, and falls back, dead.NodeContext: Spoken to her deity in her moment of death

59.speaker: Viconia DeVir
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player strikes. Viconia speaks to her goddess with her last breath, and falls back, dead.NodeContext: Spoken to her deity in her moment of death

51.speaker: Viconia DeVir
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player strikes. Viconia speaks to her goddess with her last breath, and falls back, dead.NodeContext: Spoken to her deity in her moment of death

11.speaker: Player
11.text: She's no threat anymore. Let her go.
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext: Veiled insult ('you're too soft') ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

40.speaker: Viconia DeVir
40.text: I doubt Shar will look too kindly on her failure - we all know how she treats those who disappoint her.
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext: Veiled insult ('you're too soft') ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

42.speaker: Shadowheart
42.text: I doubt Shar will look too kindly on her failure - we all know how she treats those who disappoint her.
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext: Veiled insult ('you're too soft') ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

55.speaker: Shadowheart
55.text: Go. Vanish as if you were dead.
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext: Veiled insult ('you're too soft') ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

29.speaker: Viconia DeVir
29.text: The Dark Lady was wrong about you, girl. Too much kindness lurks in your heart. Aluve.
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext: Veiled insult ('you're too soft') ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

17.speaker: Player
17.text: Kill her. Be done with this.
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Shadowheart strikes at Viconia immediately after her line, killing her.NodeContext: Cold

57.speaker: Viconia DeVir
57.text: Yes. Do it. Her embrace awaits me.
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Shadowheart strikes at Viconia immediately after her line, killing her.NodeContext: Cold

15.speaker: Shadowheart
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Shadowheart strikes at Viconia immediately after her line, killing her.NodeContext: Cold

27.speaker: Shadowheart
27.text: She doesn't care about any of us.
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Shadowheart strikes at Viconia immediately after her line, killing her.NodeContext: Cold

38.speaker: Player
38.text: No, Shadowheart. We've won. You don't need anything from her.

36.speaker: Shadowheart
36.text: You deal with her then. I need to find my parents.

53.speaker: Viconia DeVir
53.text: Careful, girl. You may not like what you find.

39.speaker: Viconia DeVir
39.text: So you think you have won? Time will tell - far easier to claim something than hold onto it.

52.speaker: Viconia DeVir
52.text: They will turn on you, in time. When you hear the whispers, and see the blades drawn, remember my face.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: I won't remember you at all. Nobody will.

18.speaker: Shadowheart
18.text: Kill her, or turn her loose. It doesn't matter. She's finished, either way.
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the playerNodeContext: Spoken to the player re: Viconia. Matter-of-fact
